item.title: 美国重新评估为内华达州锂矿提供的 23 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据不愿透露姓名的内部知情人士透露，特朗普政府正在重新评估乔-拜登总统批准的一笔 23 亿美元的贷款，这笔贷款用于开发内华达州的一个锂矿床。【原文：The Trump administration is re-evaluating a $2.3 billion loan approved by President Joe Biden for the development of a Nevada lithium deposit, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be named discussing internal business.】

item.title: 萤火虫公司发布首份财报后，因收入未达预期而下跌
item.description: 萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace Inc）在盘后交易中下跌，此前该公司公布的第二季度营收低于华尔街预期，因为这家小型火箭发射公司正努力提高飞行频率并赢得新合同。【原文：Firefly Aerospace Inc. fell in postmarket trading after it reported second-quarter revenue that fell short of Wall Street’s expectations, as the small-rocket launcher works to ramp up the frequency of its flights and win new contracts.】

item.title: 高歌猛进的行业迷失方向，一些私募股权公司注定失败
item.description:
私募股权基金的清算使投资者苦苦等待更长时间才能获得回报，迫使公司缩减募资规模、提供二次退出机会并实现多元化

。【原文：

Private equity’s reckoning has frustrated investors waiting longer for payouts, forcing firms to scale back fundraisings, offer secondary exits and diversify

】

item.title: 私募股权面临清算
item.description:
在今天的 Big Take 播客中：私募股权投资行业是如何迷失方向的？【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: How the private equity industry lost its way, and what it would take to get it back on track.

】

item.title: 加拿大计划扩建液化天然气项目，TC 能源公司仍将赌注押在美国身上
item.description: 尽管有迹象表明加拿大正表现出更友好的能源立场，但 TC 能源公司仍将专注于增加美国投资，以满足急剧增长的电力需求。【原文：TC Energy will focus on ramping up US investments to meet soaring power demand despite signals Canada is showing a more energy-friendly stance.】

item.title: 甲骨文股价大涨后上调领导层继任计划
item.description: 近几个月来，甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）加快了高层领导的继任计划，因为该公司的云计算业务大幅加速，股市也随之上涨。【原文：Oracle Corp. accelerated its succession plans for top leadership in recent months following a massive acceleration in its cloud business and stock market rally.】

item.title: 劳动委员会称亚马逊对合同工拥有 "压倒性 "控制权
item.description: 美国劳工委员会的律师周一告诉法官，亚马逊公司对分包司机实施了 "压倒性的控制"，声称他们不是公司员工。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. exercised “overwhelming control” over subcontracted drivers it claimed weren’t its employees, US labor board attorneys told a judge Monday.】

item.title: 成本上升，美联储基金利率有望在区间内走高
item.description: 在过去两年中，有效联邦基金利率一直维持在美联储基准目标区间的底部附近，很快就会走高，这表明银行超额准备金的减少速度快于预期。【原文：The effective federal funds rate — which has held near the bottom of the Federal Reserve’s target range for its benchmark over the past two years — could soon edge higher in a sign that excess bank reserves are dwindling faster than expected.】

item.title: 锡克分离主义组织领导人因加拿大枪支指控被捕
item.description: 加拿大锡克教正义组织的领导人因十几项枪支指控被捕，这是他的前任在不列颠哥伦比亚省被枪杀两年后的事，此案引发了与印度的地缘政治裂痕。【原文：The leader of Sikhs for Justice in Canada was arrested on a dozen firearms charges, two years after his predecessor was gunned down in British Columbia and the case sparked a geopolitical rift with India.】

item.title: 关注俄罗斯原油流量和炼油厂罢工，石油价格下滑
item.description: 由于交易商分析了欧盟对俄罗斯供应采取的最新举措以及乌克兰对欧佩克+成员国能源基础设施的罢工所产生的影响，石油价格下跌。【原文：Oil declined as traders parsed through the impact of the European Union’s latest moves on Russian supplies and strikes by Ukraine on the OPEC+ member’s energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 市政债券基金因押注美联储降息而吸引大量现金
item.description: 根据 CreditSights Inc. 的数据，本月初投资者向市政债券基金投入的现金至少是 2007 年以来最多的。【原文：Investors poured the most cash into municipal-bond funds earlier this month since at least 2007, according to CreditSights Inc.】

item.title: 美国首次公开募股反弹难阻私募市场快速增长
item.description: 投资银行家们正在为美国首次股票销售的复苏而欢呼。但在私人市场无节制增长的情况下，这种复苏来得太晚，无法阻止上市公司数量长达数十年的下滑。【原文：Investment bankers are cheering the recovery in US first-time stock sales. But the revival comes too late to halt a decades-long slump in the number of public companies amid the unchecked growth of private markets.】

item.title: CVS 旗下的 Omnicare 在获得 9.49 亿美元判决后申请破产
item.description: CVS Health Corp. 的子公司 Omnicare Inc. 已申请破产，此前这家药房服务提供商被勒令支付 9.49 亿美元，原因是该公司向长期护理人员不当发放处方药。【原文：CVS Health Corp. subsidiary Omnicare Inc. has filed for bankruptcy after the pharmacy-services provider was ordered to pay $949 million over claims it improperly dispensed prescription drugs to individuals in long-term care.】

item.title: 美国边境附近发现致命害虫，牛期货上涨
item.description: 在距离美国边境仅 70 英里的墨西哥发现一种致命害虫后，牛期货价格升至三周多来的最高点。【原文：Cattle futures prices rose to the highest in more than three weeks after a deadly pest was detected in Mexico just 70 miles away from the US border.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称通胀过高，必须谨慎宽松
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，她仍然十分关注通胀问题，官员们应谨慎对待降息，以避免经济过热。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said she remains laser-focused on inflation and officials should be cautious about interest-rate cuts to avoid overheating the economy.】

item.title: Monte Paschi 对 Mediobanca 的收购要约以 86.3% 的股份告终
item.description: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 对 Mediobanca SpA 的要约收购已经结束，从而获得了这家总部位于米兰的竞争对手 86.3% 的股份。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA’s tender offer for Mediobanca SpA has ended, giving it a 86.3% stake in the Milan-based rival.】

item.title: 绿光敦促百利达继续进行Aquarian交易
item.description: 绿光资本正在敦促保险公司Brighthouse Financial Inc.以每股约70美元的价格与竞争对手Aquarian Holdings进行合并，并表示愿意参与该公司的 "融资"。【原文：Greenlight Capital is urging the insurer Brighthouse Financial Inc. to proceed with a merger with rival Aquarian Holdings at around $70 per share, and said it would be open to participate in a “financing” of the company.】

item.title: 交易风险引发罕见卖出呼声，Keurig Dr Pepper 创 2020 年新低
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. 的股价周一最多下跌了 3.7%，创下 2020 年 5 月以来的盘中最低水平，此前该公司的 Canada Dry 和 Snapple 品牌被法国巴黎银行 Exane 评为唯一的卖出评级。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. shares fell as much as 3.7% on Monday, to their lowest intraday level since May 2020, after the owner of Canada Dry and Snapple brands was hit with its only sell rating from BNP Paribas Exane.】

item.title: 纽约市 5,000 多套租金稳定公寓将被拍卖
item.description: 乔尔-维纳（Joel Wiener）的 Pinnacle 集团管理着纽约市的数十栋公寓楼，其中有数千个租金稳定的单元，在陷入破产保护数月后，这些公寓楼将被出售。【原文：Dozens of New York City apartment buildings managed by Joel Wiener’s Pinnacle Group that house thousands of rent-stabilized units are being put up for sale months after falling into Chapter 11.】

item.title: 埃克森公司将以 68 亿美元的开发费用扩大圭亚那石油项目
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）发表声明称，在获得必要的监管批准后，该公司计划推进其在圭亚那的第七个石油项目。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. plans to move forward with its seventh oil project in Guyana after receiving required regulatory approvals, according to a statement.】

item.title: 英伟达将为数据中心 OpenAI 投资 1000 亿美元
item.description: Nvidia 公司将向 OpenAI 投资多达 1,000 亿美元，以支持建设新的数据中心和为人工智能工作负载提供动力所需的基础设施。【原文：Nvidia Corp. will invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI to support the building of new data centers and the infrastructure needed to power artificial intelligence workloads.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔淡化强势欧元将损害出口的担忧
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔淡化了欧元升值可能抑制竞争力，从而对出口商造成压力的担忧。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel played down concerns that the euro’s appreciation could weigh on exporters by curbing competitiveness.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰称政策过紧，面临失业率上升风险
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示利率过高，并提出了在未来几个月内积极降低利率以保护劳动力市场的理由。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said interest rates are too high and made a case for lowering them aggressively in the coming months to protect the labor market.】

item.title: 美国承诺提供支持，阿根廷资产飙升，市场止跌回升
item.description: 就在阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊急于在下月中期选举前控制本国金融市场的大规模抛售之际，美国承诺为其提供财政支持，阿根廷资产随之飙升。【原文：Argentine assets surged after the US pledged financial support for President Javier Milei just as he rushes to contain a massive selloff in the nation’s financial markets ahead of midterm elections next month.】

item.title: 由于中国需求不足，豆油价格创下一个多月来最低点
item.description: 豆油期货跌至三个多月来的最低点，因为中国对美国供应的需求不足给整个大豆综合体带来了压力。【原文：Soybean oil futures fell to the lowest in more than three months as a lack of demand from China for US supplies pressured the entire soy complex.】

item.title: 英国石油公司停止在鹿特丹建设生物燃料工厂的计划
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）将放弃在荷兰建设生物燃料工厂，因为这家英国能源巨头在今年早些时候进行了战略调整，重新专注于其核心的石油和天然气业务，并将继续关注其下游产品组合。【原文：BP Plc is to forgo building a biofuels plant in the Netherlands as the UK energy giant continues to focus its downstream portfolio, following a strategic pivot earlier this year to return to focusing on its core oil and gas business.】

item.title: Better Home 业绩大涨，Opendoor 的幕后推手大举进攻
item.description: 在埃里克-杰克逊（Eric Jackson）表示他的对冲基金已经押注 Better Home & Finance Holding Co.【原文：Shares of Better Home & Finance Holding Co. soared after Eric Jackson said his hedge fund had bet on the stock, echoing the retail-driven rally he kicked off in Opendoor Technologies Inc. in July.】

item.title: 摩科瑞称天然气交易员夸大持仓损失数百万美元
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）称，其美国天然气交易团队的一名前负责人在 2024 年虚报了交易，导致该大宗商品交易公司蒙受了 "数千万美元 "的损失。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. says a former head of one of its US natural gas trading teams misreported transactions in 2024, resulting in “tens of millions of dollars” in losses for the commodity trading firm.】

item.title: 分析师称 "改变游戏规则 "的黄金发现令巴里克股价飙升
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）的股价创下五年来最大涨幅，原因是该公司的一个美国项目有望成为一个新的大型金矿，从而提振了这家在风险之地遭遇挫折的公司的前景。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. shares are on their biggest tear in five years on prospects that a US project will become a major new gold mine, boosting the outlook of a company hit by setbacks in risky places.】
